Package com.cm.projects.spring.resource.chasis.service

Interface ChasisService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChasisServiceTemplate
public interface ChasisService
Handles chasis business logic such as validations and persisting entities. Methods include:
  • validateRelEntities(Object, PropertyAccessor)

  • Method Details

    • validateRelEntities

      void validateRelEntities​(java.lang.Object t, org.springframework.beans.PropertyAccessor accessor) throws NotFoundException, ExpectationFailed
      Checks if relation entities exists in the repository
      Parameters:
      t - Entity
      accessor - Bean Wrapper
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if relational entities cannot be found
      ExpectationFailed - if relational entities are not active

    • validateUniqueFields

      void validateUniqueFields​(org.springframework.beans.BeanWrapper accessor) throws GeneralBadRequest
      Used to validate unique fields in a given entity against existing records in the database. Unique fields are identified using @Unique annotation.
      Parameters:
      accessor - entity bean wrapper
      Throws:
      java.lang.RuntimeException - If the current field doesn't have an id field (Field annotated with @Id)
      GeneralBadRequest - If unique validation fails on a field annotated with @Unique annotation

    • validateUniqueFields

      void validateUniqueFields​(java.util.Collection<?> t) throws GeneralBadRequest
      Validate unique fields in a collections
      Parameters:
      t -
      Throws:
      GeneralBadRequest
      See Also:
      validateUniqueFields(BeanWrapper)

    • instantiateEntity

      <T> java.lang.Object instantiateEntity​(T id, java.lang.Class<?> type) throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.InstantiationException
      Instatiate an entity with an id.
      Parameters:
      id - entity id
      Returns:
      Entity Object and {@link null} if the id field cannot be found
      Throws:
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if get field cannot be found for the id field
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if the constructor method is inaccessible
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if number of constructor args differ
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if the constructor represents an abstract class

    • getEntityId

      java.io.Serializable getEntityId​(java.lang.Object entity)
      Used to retrieve id from an entity
      Parameters:
      entity - Entity record
      Returns:
      Serializable

    • tryParse

      java.util.Date tryParse​(java.lang.String dateString) throws java.text.ParseException
      Parse date
      Parameters:
      dateString - date as a string
      Returns:
      Date can return null if can't parse Date
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - if string date cannot be parsed

    • findAll

      <T> java.util.stream.Stream<T> findAll​(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pg, java.lang.Class<T> clazz, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.persistence.EntityManager entityManager) throws java.text.ParseException
      Used to stream records from the persistance unit using the specified filters
      Type Parameters:
      T - Entity Class Type
      Parameters:
      pg - pagealbe object containing size and sort params
      clazz - Entity class
      request - HttpServletRequest
      entityManager - EntityManager
      Returns:
      Stream of entities
      Throws:
      java.text.ParseException - Occurs when date cannot be parsed to Date
